and confounded the Grizzlies with his quickness. The 76ers never trailed over the last three quarters but played fast and loose with the lead until Allen Iverson took charge in the fourth quarter, when he scored 11 points. Allen Iverson got it going and http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_32pts_12asts_clutch_FT_vs_Grizzlies_NBA_07/08 Trailing by seven points with 3:12 left, the Denver Nuggets didn't panic. They made veteran plays. The Memphis Grizzlies were hurt by their youth. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. "This was a Yao Ming win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said. "Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. I Roy think a game like this is going to help us down the road." Elias Says Allen Iverson

the school to talk about animal-cruelty issues, Theresa Ellis said. "I got a call from the Humane Society. They had to cancel the event due to an NFL scheduling conflict," she said. Michael Vick did seem disappointed about the postponement when asked about the planned visit after the NFC's first practice yesterday. Carmelo Anthony and AI shot a combined 10-for-38 and finished with 16 and 15 points, respectively. No thanks to the Lakers, either, suggested coach Phil Jackson. Hill from the spring of 2009 until March 2010 when Mr. Barack Obama signed the health care law. The debate was passionate- and in one instance... at variance... with all the talk about new civility: On Jan. 19, the Republican-controlled House voted 245 to 189 to repeal health care reform. The party line vote capped a vigorous debate in which Republicans vilified the health care law and Democrats exalted it, reports CBS News Congressional correspondent Nancy Cordes . "When you order every American to buy health insurance whether they want it, need it or not, that's a government takeover of healthcare," said Nancy Pelosi Mike Pence , R-Indiana, on the floor.
